alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 2:15PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Glacier County through 245 PM MDT... At 214 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles northeast of North Browning, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Glacier County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for north central Montana.
